speaker: giffany
dialog: Heyaaaa! Ooh you're looking great today, you do something with your hair?

speaker: giffany
dialog: Yes? No? Eh, you look cute regardless, ahaha! Anyways, welcome to your first minigame...it's the only one we have right now!

speaker: giffany
dialog: It's simple! For this demo, all you use the left and right arrow keys to control the cart, make sure you collect as many of my hearts as possible but avoid heartbreaks if you can!

speaker: giffany2
dialog: I really like you, so don't disappoint me like everyone else, haha!
